title: client issue
body:
I decided to try and upgrade to the new client, and it failed. now every time i click LAUNCH i get a message saying to re-install alpha client. i tried uninstalling it completely through control panel but it fails due to "another program is being installed" which doesnt even show up on my desktop. I tried clicking my way through the website but the sign up button is disabled. Im aware i need to upgrade to the beta but there is no link provided in the client prior to clicking LAUNCH. so i am currently unable to get passed the opening. someone assist me ASAP it is extremely frustrating.


message: https://gyazo.com/484f742eb572db6a3ff59f32e09a6777

replies.body:
Sometimes must have gone wrong with your upgrade process, since those are the conditions in which we've seen this error crop up. You should be able to resolve this by first disabling your Firewall/Antivirus that you have running, then head into your League install folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). Once inside this folder, delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file, then launch the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right click) and attempt the upgrade again.

Once the process completes, you can re-enable your Firewall/Antivirus. Let me know if this resolved the error for you.
